description: Everybody has an inner rockstar waiting to be set free, and the Logitech Wireless Microphone will help to make it happen. Whether you are jamming out by yourself, or leading your band to greater heights, this high-quality, professionally-styled cordless microphone lets you own the stage.You were born to perform. So don't let a corded microphone cramp your style.The next time you get “the band” together to play your favorite music game, grab the professionally styled Logitech Wireless Microphone and own the stage. It features high-quality digital audio, a design that's every bit as authentic as the mics the pro use, and 20+ hours of battery life so you can perform encore after encore without having to worry about changing batteries. Play with the Best.Key Features      Cordless, digital microphoneAllows greater freedom during gameplay, and delivers high-quality voice reproduction. Authentic, professional designOffers a heightened sense of realism for a more immersive experience. 20+ hours battery lifeLets you perform encore after encore, while minimizing the hassle of changing batteries. Works with most popular singing gamesMakes your favorite games even more fun to play.
